name: Ping Identity
logoSvg:
<svg width="160" height="34" viewBox="0 0 160 34" role="img" aria-label="Ping Identity">
  <rect x="0" y="6" width="22" height="22" fill="currentColor" opacity=".95"/>
  <text x="30" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="700" fill="currentColor">Ping</text>
  <text x="78" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="500" fill="currentColor">Identity</text>
</svg>

name: Southwest

hero.title: Find flights and fares
hero.subtitle: Manage trips, check in, and explore deals.

logoSvg:
<svg width="180" height="34" viewBox="0 0 180 34" role="img" aria-label="Southwest">
  <text x="0" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="22" font-weight="800" fill="currentColor">Southwest</text>
  <path d="M152 11c3-3 8-3 11 0 3 3 3 8 0 11l-6 6-6-6c-3-3-3-8 0-11z" fill="#e11d48" opacity=".9"/>
  <path d="M152 11c3-3 8-3 11 0" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round" opacity=".9"/>
</svg>

name: American Airlines

hero.title: Log in to your account
hero.subtitle: Not an AAdvantage® member? Join now

logoSvg:
<svg width="190" height="34" viewBox="0 0 190 34" role="img" aria-label="American">
  <text x="0" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="22" font-weight="800" fill="currentColor">American</text>
  <path d="M136 10l10 14" stroke="#e11d48" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M146 10l10 14" stroke="#2563eb" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</svg>

name: FedEx

hero.title: Enter your user ID and password to log in
hero.subtitle: Create a user ID

logoSvg:
<svg width="150" height="34" viewBox="0 0 150 34" role="img" aria-label="FedEx">
  <text x="0" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="900" fill="#4d148c">Fed</text>
  <text x="54" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="900" fill="#ff6600">Ex</text>
</svg>

name: Bank of America

hero.title: Banking made easier
hero.subtitle: Securely manage your accounts and cards.

logoSvg:
<svg width="220" height="34" viewBox="0 0 220 34" role="img" aria-label="Bank of America">
  <text x="0" y="24" font-family="system-ui,Segoe UI,Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="900" fill="currentColor">Bank of America</text>
  <path d="M188 10h24" stroke="#2563eb" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M188 16h24" stroke="#b91c1c" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M188 22h24" stroke="#2563eb" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</svg>
